h2_title: Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong
content: If you want to make the most of the spells you can cast, the Gore-Eye Daoist moderately buffs your Maximum Mana levels. To complement the equipped effect, his Raging Blood attack sees him create an area that will enhance your attacks along as you stay inside the glow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Spirits_to_Use.md', within the main section titled 'Best Spirits to Use', specifically from the subsection 'Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
If you want to make the most of the spells you can cast, the Gore-Eye Daoist moderately buffs your Maximum Mana levels. To complement the equipped effect, his Raging Blood attack sees him create an area that will enhance your attacks along as you stay inside the glow.
